medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with 6 hours of acute onset RUQ pain after eating last night. Reports having a bloated feeling and persistent, severe RUQ pain. Another attack of RUQ pain occurred a couple of hours later, radiating to the epigastrum and LUQ, with a sensation of discomfort. Similar episodes of pain over the past couple of years, but less severe and self-limited. No fevers, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea at home, but experienced chills on arrival to the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: COPD, prostate cancer, back pain, melanoma s/p excision.
